title: Investment Analyst (Global Frontier Markets)
text:
Our Client in the Investments Industry is looking for an Investment Analyst to be responsible for analysing and conducting research on Global Frontier market companies to support the Investment Manager.

The Frontiers team of 4 individuals is Cape Town based and travel will be required as part of the role to interesting and exciting destinations.

Main duties and responsibilities:



Full research responsibilities, including company and sector analysis of companies within Frontier Markets.



Detailed research including the building of financial models and valuations of companies.



Presentation of recommendations to the investment team





Competencies and ideal personality attributes:



Confident self-starter with strong conviction



Motivated by performance-based rewards



Willingness to learn



Able to think differently about business and investments
